name: Kip King
summary: Kip King. Actor: Westworld. Kip King was born on 11 August 1937 in Chicago, Illinois, USA. He was an actor and writer, known for Westworld (1973), Meet the Fockers (2004) and A Night at the Roxbury (1998). He was previously married to Hajnalka E. Biro. He died on 15 July 2010 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
